title: Race Time Synthetic Optimizer
description: Cross-seeding optimization-based synthetic optimizer algorithm using C++ and Python to improve race times for World Solar Challenge racing.

title: Flappy Bird AI
description: Flappy Bird game built from scratch using Python and Pygame, implementing a neural network to play the game.

title: Movie Recommendation System
description: Sentiment classification pipeline using SVMs on Amazon Prime Video reviews, involving custom feature extraction, hyperparameter tuning with cross-validation, and engineering a high-performing multiclass classifier.
